text: Higeno Onani'a Devitina amanage huno asmi'ne, kini nera ranimoka, amne erinka nazano hunaku'ma hanana zana huo. Hagi Kresramanama vanana zana nagra bulimakao afura negami'na, witi honama refuzafu'nepoa zafaramina kamisugenka tevea hanavazinka Kresramana vugahane. Hagi witi ofama hanana witiramina nagrake'za maka kamisugenka ofa hugahane.
